backend/main.mo: Defines core trading, wallet, bonus, and profile types with maps for storage plus admin‑protected MPesa number and basic profile endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the main React script.
frontend/ops/redeploy-runbook.md: Runbook describing how to trigger, verify, and troubleshoot a full rebuild and redeploy of the application.
frontend/ops/smoke-test-checklist.md: Smoke‑test checklist covering landing page, navigation, authentication, profile setup, trading, and wallet functionality after deploy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, handles post-login redirection, and renders the main app layout with theme, error boundary, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/BonusManag: Provides a form for admins to apply bonuses to users and displays existing bonus entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/DepositReq: Displays pending deposit requests and allows admins to approve or reject them with optional notes.
frontend/src/components/admin/RevenuePan: Shows total platform revenue and lists recent trading fee events.
frontend/src/components/admin/TradingSta: Calculates and displays overall trading metrics and shows a table of recent trades.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserDirect: Aggregates unique users from trades and deposits, listing them and enabling detailed user inspection.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserInspec: Displays a user's trades, deposits, bonuses, fees and summary metrics with tables and formatted stats.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthRequire: Prompts unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity with error handling and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component handling Internet Identity auth flow and related errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating a user profile with display name submission and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation, share link, and conditional admin/auth links.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a recovery screen with reset.
frontend/src/components/system/CenteredL: Centered loading card showing a spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/components/trading/OpenTrad: Displays a table of open trades with details and a button to close each trade.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeHis: Shows a table of closed trades with pricing, P&L, fees, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeTic: Provides a form for opening new trades, selecting pair, direction, leverage, and margin.
frontend/src/components/wallet/DepositFo: Form for submitting deposit requests, including M‑Pesa details when applicable.
frontend/src/components/wallet/MpesaInst: Displays M‑Pesa deposit or withdrawal instructions based on the selected operation.
frontend/src/components/wallet/RequestsH: Combines deposit, bonus, and fee records into a unified transaction history table.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WithdrawF: Form for requesting withdrawals, supporting M‑Pesa phone entry when selected.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Exports basic app branding constants like name, tagline, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBonuses.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching user and system bonuses and applying bonuses with cache invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Defines hooks to fetch the caller’s user profile, role, admin status, and balance using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFees.ts: Offers hooks to read trading fees and platform revenue and to submit trading fees with relevant query invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook for login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a placeholder hook for fetching combined backend data using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrading.ts: Provides hooks for opening and closing trades and retrieving open, historical, and all trades with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Includes hooks for deposits, withdrawals, deposit approvals, and related status queries with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme variables, utilities, and premium gradient styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page enforcing authentication and admin checks and rendering tabs for deposits, bonuses, revenue, trading, and users.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature list, and login flow with config validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page showing an error message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/TradingPage.tsx: Authenticated trading interface showing balance, open trades, P&L, and tabs for trading actions and history.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Authenticated wallet page for viewing balance, depositing, withdrawing, and reviewing transaction history.
frontend/src/utils/authConfig.ts: Validates the Internet Identity provider URL and returns errors for missing or invalid configuration.
frontend/src/utils/loginRecovery.ts: Wraps login attempts with a timeout and standardized error handling for common login failures.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginRedirect.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the intended post-login navigation path using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/shareableLink.ts: Builds a shareable hash-based URL that works in canister deployments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings for layout, fonts, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state, existing login-related issues, and feature requirements for fixing authentication and onboarding flows.
